name: Jade

traceMaterials.itemName: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

story: A senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts, known for her cornerstone "Jade of Credit."A cold and elegant moneylender, she is skilled at understanding the human heart, with a personal hobby called "Bonajade Exchange."She's willing to wait patiently for high-value acquisitions and adept at extracting value from seemingly destitute clients.

skills.name: Lash of Riches
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Acquisition Surety
skills.description: Makes a single ally become a Debt Collector and increases their SPD. After a Debt Collector attacks, they deal minor Additional Quantum DMG to each enemy target hit and consume their own HP. When Jade becomes a Debt Collector, she cannot gain the SPD boost effect, and her attacks do not consume HP.

skills.name: Vow of the Deep
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies and gains increased DMG multiplier for follow-up attack.

skills.name: Fang of Flare Flaying
skills.description: After Jade or a Debt Collector ally attacks, Jade gains 1 point of Charge for each enemy target hit. When the Charge reaches #3[i] points, consumes the #3[i] points to launch 1 instance of follow-up attack, dealing Quantum DMG to all enemies.When Jade launches follow-up attacks, gains Pawned Asset and increases CRIT DMG, stacking up to #2[i] times.

skills.name: Visionary Predation
skills.description: Inflicts Blind Fealty on all enemies within a set area. Attacking an enemy with Blind Fealty causes all enemies with Blind Fealty to enter combat simultaneously. Upon entering combat, deals minor Quantum DMG to all enemies and immediately gains #3[i] stack(s) of Pawned Asset.

eidolons.name: Altruism? Nevertheless Tradable
eidolons.description: The follow-up attack DMG from Jade's Talent increases by 20%. Every time Jade gets Charged, she additionally gains 1 point(s) of Charge.

eidolons.name: Morality? Herein Authenticated
eidolons.description: When there are 15 stacks of Pawned Asset, Jade's CRIT Rate increases by 18%.

eidolons.name: Honesty? Soon Mortgaged
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Sincerity? Put Option Only
eidolons.description: When using Ultimate, the DMG Jade deals ignores 12% of enemy targets' DEF, lasting for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Hope? Hitherto Forfeited
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Equity? Pending Sponsorship
eidolons.description: When there are Debt Collector allies on the field, Jade's Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%, and Jade gains the Debt Collector state.
